item.title: OneRec: Unifying Retrieve and Rank with Generative Recommender and Iterative Preference Alignment
item.description: OneRec: A unified generative model that replaces the traditional retrieve-and-rank strategy, significantly improving recommendation quality in real-world scenarios.
